player.name: Nikola Jokic
player.physicalDescription: tall 6'11" with a sturdy athletic build, not traditionally cut but strong and capable, pale white skin, brown hair, scraggly beard, sleepy unbothered expression, Serbian
player.archetype: The Joker, MVP who looks like he wandered in from a pickup game, genius disguised as casual

figure.name: Isaac
figure.attribute: bundle of wood and peaceful demeanor
figure.attributeDescription: bundle of firewood on his back recalling the binding, staff of a wealthy patriarch
figure.visualStyle: peaceful patriarch of Israel, the promised son
figure.clothing: fine robes of a wealthy patriarch, earth tones and cream colors, comfortable dignified garments
figure.physicalDescription: gentle patient expression, medium build, balding with white remaining hair, long white beard, kind tired eyes that have seen much, olive skin, peaceful demeanor
figure.archetype: The Patient One, waited and trusted, blessed despite setbacks

connection.thematic: Both were underestimated and patient, rising to greatness through quiet trust in their path
connection.narrative: Second-round pick. Second son. Both just waited their turn and inherited everything.
connection.relationship: Patient souls who received more than anyone expected

interactions.description: Two patient figures, unbothered by the chaos around them
Casual acknowledgment between those who don't need to prove anything

customInteractions.name: No Look Akeida
customInteractions.playerAction: threading a no-look pass through defenders, eyes looking away, ball finding its target
customInteractions.figureAction: tied up and submitting with perfect faith
